authors.headline: Driven to improve the well-being of humans, animals and our shared environment through business, innovation and education.
Driven to improve the well-being of humans, animals and our shared environment through business, innovation and education.

profile_positions.description:
At uQinisa we believe that the well-being of humans, animals and our shared environment are closely connected and can be improved through business, innovation and education.

We found, invest in, and consult for (early-stage) enterprises which share the same belief:

▪️Cerba Research: https://www.linkedin.com/company/cerba-research/ (www.cerbaresearch.com)
▪️Moxiam: https://www.linkedin.com/company/moxiam/ (www.moxiam.com)
▪️Green Mining DAO: https://www.linkedin.com/company/green-mining-dao/mycompany/ (www.greenminingdao.io)
▪️Oasys Now: https://www.linkedin.com/company/oasys-now/about/ (www.oasysnow.com)
▪️Lino & Luka: https://www.linkedin.com/company/lino-&-luka/ (www.linoluka.com)
▪️Orlar: https://www.linkedin.com/company/orlar/ (www.orlar.com)
▪️Pickles: https://www.linkedin.com/company/askpickles/ (www.pickles.co)

#uQinisa #ubuntu
#TechForGood #Sustainability #SocialEntrepreneurship
#HumanHealth #AnimalHealth #EnvironmentalHealth
profile_positions.title: Founder | Management Consultant & Angel Investor

profile_positions.description:
Cerba Research - Your precision medicine partner

At Cerba Research we provide world-class clinical research to help life science companies successfully develop the predictive and precision medicines of the future and help people live healthier lives. We are committed to delivering the next generation of human-centric healthcare by transforming research, and advancing health together.

Advancing Research, Advancing Health

https://cerbaresearch.com

#cerba #cerbahealthcare #cerbaresearch 
#viroclinics-ddl #viroclinics #ddl
profile_positions.title: Strategic Consultant l Global Network Laboratories

profile_positions.description:
At Moxiam we believe in a world of independence with empathic care for our seniors.

Our user-centric digital solutions aim to improve everyday life for both seniors and carers, allowing you to always be present: fully engaged when you are together, and almost there when you are apart.

Welcome to our world!
www.moxiam.com

#moxiam
#everymomentcounts
profile_positions.title: Vice President l Growth & Commercial Operations

profile_positions.description:
The first DAO to mine BTC. Sustainably.

Green Mining DAO is the first tokenized bitcoin mining company that is committed to promoting sustainability and reducing carbon emissions. We aim to become the largest and most progressive community-owned btc mining ecosystem in the world.

Our DAO sources renewable energy from a hydro power plant at competitive prices and plans to continue the production of green bitcoin below global production cost average.

Green Mining DAO offers investors a unique opportunity to invest in sustainable and profitable bitcoin mining, with regular dividend payouts and a clear roadmap for growth and expansion.

www.greenminingdao.io
profile_positions.title: Founding Collective l Strategic Advisor & Investor

profile_positions.location: Rotterdam–The Hague metropolitan area, South Holland, Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
OASYS NOW is a Dutch company founded with a vision to better serve people and improve their health by leveraging the latest breakthroughs in technology and science. We fuel precision medicine by facilitating repurposing of DNA data via our transparent, privacy-first & ethical-by-design data sharing platform.

www.oasysnow.com
profile_positions.title: Strategic Advisor

profile_positions.description:
We are Leef! and we believe that a sustainable future is build on value creation that goes beyond shareholder value alone.  

Started off as a Dutch family business, we empower value-minded decision makers by transforming the decision hurdle into an enabler for success. 

We help business leaders and entrepreneurs to make smarter and faster decisions on project portfolios, product/service introductions and business transformations alike.

Imagine It. Do It.

https://www.leef-consultancy.com

profile_positions.title: Multilingual Bear Whisperer

profile_positions.description:
Lino & Luka is a children's brand founded with the belief that we can improve people's lives through business. In 2017, Lino & Luka published its first children's book "Tea for two" followed by the Dutch translation "Thee voor twee" five years later. 

For every book you buy, Lino & Luka will donate a copy to a child in need.
One for one, every time. 

Find out more at www.linoluka.com 

#linoluka
#togetherinmomentsthatmatter #teafortwo #oneforone 
#theevoortwee #eenvooreen

profile_positions.description:
Member of the Human Pharma Business Unit Executive Committee. 
Co-lead for the One Human Pharma Portfolio Strategy 2018.
profile_positions.title: Chief of Staff Human Pharma Business Unit (Head HPBU Support)

profile_positions.description:
Management consulting in the human pharma, consumer health care, animal health and contract manufacturing business segments.


Key projects:

Project ImPaCt: redesigning the functional set-up of the corporation's global Prescription Medicines organisation into a business unit structure.

Project LSCC: to conduct the site evaluation for a 0.5 billion investment into a new Large Scale Cell Culture (LSCC) plant for the corporation's biopharmaceutical contract manufacturing business.

Project RASC: prepare the set-up of a global Regulatory Affairs Service Center (RASC) at one of the corporation's European operative units.
profile_positions.title: Corporate Director Internal Consulting

profile_positions.description:
Double hat role as global brand manager and global program leader for a veterinary brand originating from the corporation's human pharma portfolio. 


Areas of responsibility:

- Global brand strategy, positioning, customer targeting, marketing messages, profitability and launch of a feline brand (chronic kidney disease & hypertension) in European, North American and Australasian markets. 
- Leading a cross-functional team with representatives from global marketing and 6 local markets.

- The coordinated management of all life cycle management activities (including new registrations, line extensions and international, multi-centre post-marketing trials) for the brand. 
- Together with the international project leader from R&D, lead the program team consisting of representatives from operations, regulatory affairs, Q&A, R&D, patents & IP, and global marketing based in Germany and North America.

volunteer_experiences.description: Advisory Board Veterinary Master's Curriculum ("Werkveldadviesraad Masteropleiding Diergeneeskunde"): advisory role for the continuous development of the Master's curriculum of Utrecht University's College of Veterinary Medicine.

Playing the role as family dad “Ruben” in the children’s series “The Faker” on Dutch national television (NPO Zapp - www.zapp.nl)

https://www.npostart.nl/de-faker/17-01-2023/AT_300008026

Pharma Group represents the voice of the innovative pharmaceutical industry in Vietnam. Its 26 members share the same mission: to collaborate with the government of Vietnam to ensure timely and sustainable access for Vietnamese patients to high quality, safe and innovative pharmaceuticals.

Bi-monthly tasting of geographically themed line ups of single malts of alternating Scottish and non-Scottish origin. The society was proud to host its first traditional charity Burns Supper in Ho Chi Minh City in 2021 including a classic piper and haggis.
Dehorning (white rhino; anti-poaching campaigns), translocation (white rhino, buffalo, zebra) and treatment (lion) of game with Dr Cobus Raath's veterinary and translocation teams.
Translocation of approx. 100 roan antilopes from the Okavango Delta region (Botswana) to South Africa with the Kruger Park Game Translocation Unit led by Dr Markus Hofmeyr.
Monitoring of recently released (elephant, lion, wild dog) and off-site translocation (roan antilope) of game under the supervision of Dr Markus Hofmeyr.
